item.title: A message from Guidance:
item.description: Students looking to make a course change MUST sign up for a meeting in the Guidance office. Last day for course changes is Monday, February 9th.

item.title: A message from Mr. Vonesch:
item.description: STA's annual "Shrove Tuesday Pancake Breakfast" is coming up in 2 weeks! If you need volunteer hours, or would just like to help make and serve pancakes, please see Mr. Vonesch at the chaplaincy office to sign up!

item.title: A message from Mme Perron and Mrs Kwok:
item.description: There will be a mandatory unity club meeting today at lunch at 10:40 in room 127 Mrs Zurawski's room please bring your lunch. All presenters MUST attend!!!

item.title: A message from Mme Perron:
item.description:
All Europe Trip Students are reminded to bring in any remaining items for our Clothing and gently used items fundraiser as we will be dropping items off on Friday afternoon.

Monday Feb 2nd

It is a week 1 schedule.

A reminder to any interested grade 10/11 students, applications for next year's service trip to Costa Rica are due tomorrow. Please see Mr. Vonesch at the chaplaincy office for details.

Grad photo orders have started to arrive. If you ordered grad photos, please check in Guidance with Mrs Marcellus to pick them up. Thanks!

Reminder to Varsity Girls' hockey players to check Teams for important information regarding hockey this week.

All online students need to report to the atrium at the beginning of their online period today to meet briefly with Ms. Timmins and Mrs. Marcellus.

Students looking to make a course change MUST sign up for a meeting in the Guidance office.

Attention Ravens! Interested in joining the Varsity CrossFit Team? Sign-up sheets are posted outside the gymnasium. There will be an info meeting on Tuesday, February 10 at 10:45 a.m. in the weight room. Training sessions run Tuesdays from 2:20–3:00 p.m. and our CrossFit competition is scheduled for April 2026. Come check it out!

the Weight Room is open daily at lunch from 10:40–11:20. Thursdays are reserved for female students only. Plus, the weight room is also open Tuesday after school. Come Join Mrs. Longval for a strength, cardio or stretch session.

There will be a meeting for 7/8 boys volleyball today at 11:20 in room 148.

Tuesday Feb 3rd

It is a week 1 schedule.

Students looking to make a course change MUST sign up for a meeting in the Guidance office. Last day for course changes is Monday, February 9th.

There will be a meeting today during the am break for all Web crew and 7/8 student council. The meeting will take place in Mme Plourdes classroom.

The ski/snowboard outing that was scheduled for Thursday Feb 12 will now take place on Wed Feb 11th. This weeks outing remains on Thursday.

Applications for next year's service trip to Costa Rica are due today. Please submit to Mr. Vonesch before the end of the day

STA's annual "Shrove Tuesday Pancake Breakfast" is coming up in 2 weeks! If you need volunteer hours, or would just like to help make and serve pancakes, please see Mr. Vonesch at the chaplaincy office to sign up!

Tomorrow evening, STA will host RHS for our final two league games for Boys Basketball. The Juniors play at 6:30 and the Seniors, 8:00. Come out and support our Ravens Boys Basketball Teams!
